inclusion.criterion: Isolated mitral valve lesion either stenosis or regurge.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Any degree of tricuspid valve regurge..
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant Aortic valve lesion needs replacement.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Other causes of pulmonary hypertension i.e.: (Chronic obstructive or restrictive pulmonary disease, connective tissue disease and chronic thromboembolism).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome with severe mitral valve prolapse, but is prepared to undergo surgery. EF of 65% on TTE.
